official-title.#text:
To release wilderness study areas administered by the Bureau of Land Management in Luna and Hidalgo
			 Counties, New Mexico that are not suitable for wilderness designation from
			 continued management as de facto wilderness areas.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: Luna and Hidalgo Counties Wilderness Study Area Release Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Release of Bureau of Land Management wilderness study areas previously identified as not suitable
			 for wilderness designation

text.#text:
Congress finds and directs that the public lands described in subsection (b) have been adequately
			 studied for wilderness designation pursuant to

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
and are no longer
			 subject to the requirement of subsection (d) of such section pertaining to
			 the management of wilderness study areas in a manner that does not impair
			 the suitability of such areas for preservation as wilderness.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 603 of the Federal
			 Land Policy and Management Act of 1976
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976/s:603

text.#text: Subsection (a) applies to public lands in Luna and Hidalgo Counties, New Mexico administered by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Federal Land Policy and
			 Management Act of 1976
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976

text.#text:
have not been designated as wilderness by an Act of Congress before the date of the enactment of
			 this Act; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
before the date of the enactment of this Act
			 as not suitable for wilderness designation.

text.#text: The following public lands cited in this subsection shall be released according to subsection (a):
Portions of the Big Hatchet Mountains Wilderness Study Area deemed unsuitable by the
Portions of the Gila Lower Box Wilderness Study Area deemed unsuitable by the
Alamo Hueco Mountains Wilderness Study Area (reflected in the map dated August 5, 2014).
Blue Creek Wilderness Study Area (reflected in the map dated July 24, 2014).
Cedar Mountains Wilderness Study Area (reflected in the map dated July 24, 2014).
Cooke’s Range Wilderness Study Area (reflected in the map dated June 11, 2014).
Florida Mountains Wilderness Study Area (reflected in the map dated May 28, 2014).
Guadalupe Canyon Wilderness Study Area (reflected in the map dated July 30, 2014).
Peloncillo Mountains Wilderness Study Area (reflected in the map dated July 24, 2014).

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
in accordance with the land use plan applicable
			 to the lands developed pursuant to

text.#text: Public lands identified in subsection (c) and released by subsection (a) shall be managed by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 202 of the Federal Land Policy
			 and Management Act of 1976
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976/s:202

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may not promulgate or issue any systemwide regulation, directive, or
			 order that would direct management of the public lands released by
			 subsection (a) in a manner contrary to the applicable land use plan.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5691 IH: Luna and Hidalgo Counties Wilderness Study Area Release Act of 2014
